  • Method Details

    • findTrips

      public boolean findTrips(double startLat, double startLon, double endLat, double endLon, int stopLimit, String currentTimeOverride)
      Method that finds viable trips between start and end points on certain conditions. Stores viable trips in temporary table in GTFS database
      Parameters:
      startLat - double start point latitude
      startLon - double start point longtitude
      endLat - double end point latitude
      endLon - double end point longtitude
      stopLimit - int limit of how many nearby stops to look for at each trip end
      currentTimeOverride - String hh:MM:SS override for current time. If you want to use current system time, pass null here
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether all the queries in the database succeeded. If false is returned, you should show an error on UI and not call any other functions interacting with the database

    • tripsAdditionalFilters

      public boolean tripsAdditionalFilters(boolean wheelchairAccess, boolean bikesAllowed)
      Method that applies additional filters on viable trips, specifically for wheelchair access and if bikes are allowed on the bus/train
      Parameters:
      wheelchairAccess - boolean idicating if you want to search for only trips that have wheelchair access
      bikesAllowed - boolean indicating if you want to search for only trips that allow a bike
      Returns:
      boolean idicating whether all queries in database succeeded

    • getTravelAdvices

      public List<TravelAdvice> getTravelAdvices(int limit)
      Method to retrieve finalized travel advices, ordered in order of when the trip is scheduled earliest to latest
      Parameters:
      limit - number of travel advices to retrieve
      Returns:
      ArrayList of TravelAdvice objects, which contain information such as route name, bus number, ArrayList of Stop objects in order of stops visited along the route, etc.
